text: Assessing avian functions and ecosystem services in agroforestry systems - Evaluación de funciones y servicios ecosistémicos de la avifauna en sistemas agroforestales - (EVALUAVE)

title: Publications
text:
Articles

Martín‐Ávila, J. A., Rebollo, S., Fernández‐Pereira, J. M., & Díaz‐Aranda, L. M. (2024) The trophic strategy of the European honey‐buzzard Pernis apivorus during breeding: extravagant specialization or ingenious solution?. Journal of Avian Biology e03221 [PDF]
Lorente-Casalini, O., Rodes-Blanco, M., Aguirre-Iglesias, S., Martín-Ávila, J. A., Molina, D. S. S., Tijerín-Triviño, J., & Astigarraga, J. (2024) Tidyverse: colección de paquetes de R para la ciencia de datos. Ecosistemas 33 (3): 2745-2745 [PDF]

(2023) Assessment of the consumption of the exotic Asian Hornet Vespa velutina by the European Honey Buzzard Pernis apivorus in southwestern Europe. Bird Study 70 (3): 136-150

title: Jorge A. Martín Ávila
text: Hi! I am currently doing my PhD in the University of Alcalá. My research topic is the pest-regulation Ecosystem Service of the Asian hornet, provided by the European honey buzzard.

title: Jorge A. Martín Ávila
text:

University of Alcalá, Alcalá de Henares | Madrid, ES PhD in Ecology, Biodiversity and Global Change | Dic 2020
